Map117.Event[16].Page[0].list.message[0]: "They will create an idol out of our fears!"
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[0]: "Greetings sister. Have you come for the holy ceremony
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[1]: "The time is now. The times the prophecies have foretold!"
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[2]: "Greetings brother. Have you come for the holy ceremony
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[3]: "The time is now. The times the prophecies have foretold!"
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[4]: "Is there something you would like to know?"
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[6]: "Tell me which god do you serve?"
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[8]: "Where there is creation, there must be destruction. Such
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[9]: "Common folk often portray Gro-goroth as a being of evil
or entity that must be avoided by all costs."
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[11: "Sylvian, the goddess... She once loved us so..."
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[13: "That is when lust, sex and addiction take a form of
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[14: "Alll-Mer is the most recent of all the older gods."
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[15: "But that is only because he made himself apparent at such
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[16: "He has existed for aeons as a seed of his father."
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[17: "Yes, there are countless older gods less known in these
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[18: "God of the Depths has an especially strong influence in
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[19: "The older gods have left this earth for us to suffer.
There are but traces of them left anymore."
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[20: "That is why many are turning their hopes for the new
gods. But many fail to see their path to ruin."
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[22: "The new gods offer new values. Values of greed, lust for
power, inhibition of sex and desperate seek for new
Map117.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[23: "Hm. So it is so - there is not room for all of us,

Map117.Event[23].Page[0].list.message[0]: "They will create an idol out of our fears!"
Map117.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[0]: "Greetings sister. Have you come for the holy ceremony
Map117.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[1]: "The time is now. The times the prophecies have foretold!"
Map117.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[2]: "Greetings brother. Have you come for the holy ceremony
Map117.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[3]: "The time is now. The times the prophecies have foretold!"
Map117.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[4]: "I am a wretched worshipper of Alll-Mer, the ascended one,
the christ, the one who died for our sins."
Map117.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[5]: "On the empty scrolls I wrote the name of our savior -
Map117.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[6]: "As the next verse I would plead him - GIVE..."
Map117.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[7]: "As the final, third verse, I would ask for CHEESE,
LANTERN, SHORT SWORD or even a book about our christ."
Map117.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[8]: "I could ask for anything and that is exactly what I would

Map117.Event[116].Page[0].list.message[3: "There is no way to break these chains..."
Map117.Event[116].Page[0].list.message[4: "The worst part is, I don't even know if the gods exist."
Map117.Event[116].Page[0].list.message[6: "You child-molesting bastard! Serves you right hanging
Map117.Event[116].Page[0].list.message[7: "I think I'll make a roof ornament out of you! My palace
needs some fresh decoration after all."
Map117.Event[116].Page[1].list.message[3: "There is no way to break these chains..."
Map117.Event[116].Page[1].list.message[6: "You are after the enlightenment too aren't you?"
Map117.Event[116].Page[1].list.message[7: "I have no interest in talking to you."
Map117.Event[116].Page[1].list.message[1: "There was a person among us who was right..."
"But we were blinded by the golden throne already at that
"One must admit his own mistakes in order to grow..."
"Go ahead. Make the same mistakes we did."
